attributes.action: pass a law to make smoke detectors a legal requirement in all rented homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to propose that it becomes a legal requirement that all homes rented by Landlords (whether privately let or Council/Housing Association let) should be fitted with smoke detectors.  Provision of a smoke detector should be added to the list of safety checks that are currently required to be carried out annually on let properties.
